alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Rosebud; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Showers with strong winds will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, northwestern Big Horn, central Carbon, Musselshell, Yellowstone, southeastern Golden Valley, northern Rosebud and northwestern Treasure Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 411 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with strong winds, extending from 14 miles north of Roundup to near Absarokee. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Red Lodge, Columbus, Roundup, Laurel, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Melstone, Lockwood, Worden, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Ballantine, Musselshell, Broadview and Pompeys Pillar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
